name: Rhythmformer
description:
Here is my submission to the 2020 Mix and Game Jam (theme - mixed genres)

What is it?

There is a hardcore mix of the arcade platformer and rhythm-based game.  Your goal is to reach as many points, as you can (my personal best is only 27)

Alright, but how do I play it?

You should survive, gaining as many points as possible by pressing the "rhythm" buttons. Pressing the button turns block near the horizontal line on that column to blue "standable" block , which instantly gives you point. If you miss block, it automatically turns into red "untouchable" block

Wow, fun game, I like it. Looks like you are an interesting creator, where can I follow you?

I have a twitter account, where I post stuff about my life, mostly about game development. I'd be happy if you follow LeKSuS

Enjoy! Any feedback is appreciated ^_^
